CustomField.formula: If((MOD(FLOOR( (Interview_Date__c -DATEVALUE("2006-01-02" ))/7),52)-1 + (100 * Year(Interview_Date__c))) + 1 = MOD(FLOOR( (Today() -DATEVALUE("2006-01-02" ))/7),52)-1 + (100 * Year(Today())) , 1, 0) + If((MOD(FLOOR( (Interview_Date_2__c -DATEVALUE("2006-01-02" ))/7),52)-1 + (100 * Year(Interview_Date_2__c)))+ 1 = MOD(FLOOR( (Today() -DATEVALUE("2006-01-02" ))/7),52)-1 + (100 * Year(Today())) , 1, 0 )+ If((MOD(FLOOR( (Interview_Date_3__c -DATEVALUE("2006-01-02" ))/7),52)-1 + (100 * Year(Interview_Date_3__c)))+ 1 = MOD(FLOOR( (Today() -DATEVALUE("2006-01-02" ))/7),52)-1 + (100 * Year(Today())) , 1, 0)
CustomField.label: Interviews Last Week
